education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering
education.institution: Usha Rama College of Engineering and Technology

projects.description: Designed and developed a Python-based application using Fastapi and MySQL to extract features from pan cards. Utilized Python libraries such as OpenCV and pytesseract for image processing and OCR. Achieved an accuracy of 95% in feature extraction. Skills used: Python, Fastapi, MySQL.
projects.name: Pan Card Features Extraction

projects.description: Developed a Rasa-based chatbot using Python and HTML to provide customer support. Implemented natural language processing techniques to improve chatbot accuracy. Skills used: Rasa Framework, Python, HTML.
projects.name: Rasa Chatbot

projects.description: Created a Python-based resume builder using Generative AI and LLMs to generate resumes. Utilized Postgresql for data storage and retrieval. Achieved an accuracy of 90% in resume generation. Skills used: Generative AI, LLM, Python, Postgresql.
projects.name: Resume Builder

projects.description: Developed a Python-based sentiment analysis tool using NLP and Google LLM API to analyze customer feedback. Achieved an accuracy of 85% in sentiment classification. Skills used: NLP, Google LLM API, Python.
projects.name: Sentiment Analysis

projects.description: Created a Python-based ATS resume matcher using NLP and Google LLM API to match resumes with job descriptions. Achieved an accuracy of 80% in resume matching. Skills used: NLP, Google LLM API, Python.
projects.name: ATS Resume matcher

resume.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented Python Developer with a strong foundation in machine learning, natural language processing, and software development. Proficient in Python, MySQL, Postgresql, and various frameworks such as Django, Flask, and Fastapi.

responsibilities: Designed and implemented machine learning algorithms using Python and NumPy, resulting in a 25% increase in model accuracy.
Collaborated with the team to develop a basic deep learning model, utilizing TensorFlow and Keras frameworks.
Conducted data preprocessing and feature engineering to improve model performance, reducing training time by 30%.
Developed a Python-based data analysis tool using Pandas and NumPy, streamlining data processing by 40%.
Implemented a Python script using requests and BeautifulSoup to scrape and parse data from a website, improving data accuracy by 20%.
Collaborated with the team to design and implement a Python-based web application using Flask, resulting in a 50% increase in user engagement.
